name: Calling Pizza
description:
Calling Pizza. with NEW pizzeria answering service sound and NEW pizza pics.
phone call with phone original ringtone.
Prank your friend. Girlfriend or boyfriend. boss. etc...
Phone with the original ringtone of the phone.

Calling Pizza Features:

* sound of answering service of pizzeria .
* options to Decline or accept call.
* variety of pizza pictures.
* simulate fake incoming call from pizza place.
* easy to use.
* For all Ages.

ENJOY!!!
